Description: Hair from a female mummy wrapped in textile.
Curator's comments: J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 132.
Exhibition history: 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
Acquisition notes: Burton sale, lot 92 (auction label reads 'Lot 92' with handwritten 'B' for 'Burton'.
